column5: a man jumped to his death on Monireth Street
column8: Phnom Penh.------The victim has not yet been identified.------Police said
column9: according to the security guard at the scene
column10: he saw the victim walking and making grunts to the bridge of the Olympia Mall. Police said that a moment later
column11: the victim jumped from the fifth floor.------Forensic police officers examined the body and confirmed that the victim had died from jumping from the bridge (suicide). Later
column12: the body was buried at Wat Teuk Thla
column14: with no papers or other objects on his person. ------AREY
